column1: Giussano (Milanese: Giussan) is a comune (municipality) in the Province of Monza and Brianza in the Italian region Lombardy
column2: located about 25 kilometres (16 mi) north of Milan.

column1: Giussano borders the following municipalities: Inverigo
Giussano received the honorary title of city with a presidential decree on 22 October 1987.
